messages.subject: FF.net comes through at last!
messages.msgSnippet: For you PeaceMaker fans fanfiction.net has _finally_ put up a Peacemaker Kurogane category. I asked them months ago and they blew it off someone on the PMK lj
messages.messageBody:
For you PeaceMaker fans fanfiction.net has _finally_ put up a Peacemaker
Kurogane category.

I asked them months ago and they blew it off someone on the PMK lj
community asks and they do it straightaway go figure Hn
